game_description: SENJU is a VR experience of traditional Japanese dance (Nihon-Buyo). It is developed in cooperation with Senju-Ryu school of traditional Japanese Dance. ( https://www.nihonbuyo.net ). You can watch a master of Nihon-Buyo dance and study the motions in detail.
